mapper.select: SELECT b.*, bf.stored_name , bcCo.cnt CoCount, bcL.cnt likeCount FROM board b, (SELECT count(bc.boardno) cnt , b.boardno FROM board_comment bc, board b WHERE bc.boardno(+)=b.boardno GROUP BY b.boardno ) bcCo, (SELECT count(bl.boardno) cnt , b.boardno FROM board_like bl, board b WHERE bl.boardno(+)=b.boardno GROUP BY b.boardno ) bcL, board_file bf WHERE 1 =1 AND b.boardno = bcCo.boardno AND b.boardno = bcL.boardno AND bf.boardno = b.boardno AND b.boardno = #{BOARDNO} ORDER BY b.boardno
mapper.update: UPDATE BOARD_COMMENT SET C_CONTENT=#{cContent} WHERE COMMENTNO= #{commentno}
